name: Code Onslaught
description:
292 000 Dev Highscore - can you beat it?

Powerful weapons will randomly drop on the ground, but they can only shoot once

Z - to Jump and double Jump

X - to Dash

C - to Shoot

Arrows - to Move and Aim

Esc - to Pause

Music by Milo Giraldo

http://www.milogiraldo.com/

https://www.instagram.com/_milogiraldo/
